attributes.description:
DEMO CLEARANCE
Mahindra Vaal welcomes trade-ins from all makes and models of vehicles. We offer on-site finance through all major banks, subject to qualifying criteria. All vehicles undergo Dekra AA Roadworthy test to ensure vehicle is mechanically sound. Extended Service Plans & Warranties are available as an optional extra and can be bolted onto your finance. License, registration and admin fee not included in price as advertised. Mahindra Vaal delivers country wide with a smile

attributes.title: 2022 Honda WR-V 1.2 Elegance

attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877248729. **NEW MODEL** 
**ELEGANCE**
**APPLE CARPLAY AND ANDROID AUTO** 
**SMART KEYLESS ENTRY** 
**CRUISE CONTROL** 
**7 INCH DISPLAY AUDIO INFOTAINMENT** 
**REVERSE PARKING CAMERA** 
**HONDA MAGIC SEATS** 

**SERVICE PLAN 4 YEARS OR 60 000KMS** 
**BALANCE OF WARRANTY OF 5 YEARS OR 200 000KMS**
**AA ROADSIDE ASSIST – 3 YEARS**

The Honda WR-V’s suspension setup is softly sprung. It sails over minor potholes, slightly disjointed patches and small sharp bumps with aplomb. Storage capacity is another trump card, testified by the numerous stowage spaces such as cup holders and space in the front armrest and front seat pockets. The many reasons to purchase the Honda WR-V – practicality, spacious cabin and comfort.
